price: Lalle ne a cikin sãɓãwar dare da yini, da abin da Allah Ya halitta a cikin sammai da ƙasa, haƙĩƙaakwai ãyõyi ga mutãne waɗan da suke yin taƙawa.
arabic: إِنَّ فِي ٱخۡتِلَٰفِ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَٱلنَّهَارِ وَمَا خَلَقَ ٱللَّهُ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِ لَأٓيَٰتٖ لِّقَوۡمٖ يَتَّقُونَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna fī ikh'tilāfi al-layli wal-nahāri wamā khalaqa al-lahu fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi laāyātin liqawmin yattaqūna
